resources.string:
Select a role:
- Anchors can publish streams via CDNs upon room entry by specifying the room entry parameter `streamid`.
- Anchors can publish streams via CDNs upon room entry by specifying the room entry B2parameter B2
- If anchors choose to relay streams to CDNs, audience can enter the playback address to watch the streams.

Before you publish streams to CDNs, do the following:
1. Enable relayed push in the console. A push address will be generated automatically.
2. Register a domain name for playback and complete ICP filing.
Documentation: CDN Relayed Live Streaming (https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/647/16826); On-Cloud MixTranscoding (https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/647/16827)"
Playback address: http://{your playback domain name}/{stream_id}.flv
On-Cloud Stream Mixing (2 or More Anchors)
Playback address: http://{your playback domain name}/{stream_id}.flv
